attributes.action: STOP Heathrow Flight Path Trail in Ascot, Sunnighill and surronding areas
attributes.additional_details:
During the period  Dec 2013 June 2014 - Heathrow Airport and NATS had a joint trail to look into alternative flight paths for departure and arrival routes.
The area of Ascot, Sunninghill and surrounding areas continues to now see deprture flights coming over the area at lower altitudes which has increased the noise significantly throughout the day (weekdays and weekend included)
Complaints raised via the LHR Noise complaints and community relations remains unanswered.
We want the government to STOP this trail over Ascot, Sunninghill and surrounding areas with immedidate effect and implement a proper consultation period to allow us to have our say - and not be ignored.
